New Capitol Cinemas bụ usoro ihe nkiri na Botswana.

New Capitol Cinema meghere Botswana mbụ Cineplex na 2002, dị ka ụlọ ihe nkiri ihuenyo anọ na Riverwalk shopping Mall na Gaborne East.. N'otu afọ ahụ, New Capitol Cinemas meghere ihe nkiri itoolu na Game Shopping Mall na Gaborone West. Otu n'ime ndị otu ahụ bụ Rizwan K
Desai, nwa Abdul Kadir Desai, onye ọchụnta ego nke nwere ụlọ ihe nkiri Capitol na Mall.
N'afọ 2017, a mara ọkwa ihe nkiri ọhụrụ nke Capitol, at the  Acacia. E meghere Platinum Lounge, na-enye ndị na-aga ihe nkiri nri n'ebe ahụ na 2019.
